column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Wanted to like this pizza real bad. The staff was nice and seated us quickly. The wings are possibly the best I've had anywhere. The pizza just was not good. We got the original and it was just bland. The sauce was bland
column2: the crust was bland. I could definitely do better in my own kitchen
column3: and I'm. Or really a cook. I thought about giving 4 stars for the service and the wings
column4: but when it comes down to it it's all about the pizza here
column5: and this just didn't make the cut. Sorry
